name: Hell Walkers
flavorText: “Hell is a state of mind.” -Kovan the Merciless
flavorTextHtml: “Hell is a state of mind.” -Kovan the Merciless
setDescription:
(2) Set:     
 Your generators generate 2 additional Hatred and 1 Discipline.(4) Set:     
 Gain 60% damage reduction and deal 60% increased damage for 8 seconds if no enemy is within 10 yards of you.(6) Set:     
 Your generators, Multishot, and Vengeance deal 350% increased damage for every point of Discipline you have.
setDescriptionHtml:
(2) Set:
Your generators generate 2 additional Hatred and 1 Discipline.
(4) Set:
Gain 60% damage reduction and deal 60% increased damage for 8 seconds if no enemy is within 10 yards of you.
(6) Set:
Your generators, Multishot, and Vengeance deal 350% increased damage for every point of Discipline you have.
